titles.title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 3401) making emergency supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2019, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 3401) making emergency supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2019, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 116-130, by Mr. McGovern.
Rule provides for consideration of Senate amendment to H.R. 3401.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 34.

action.text: By direction of the Committee on Rules, Mr. McGovern called up H.Res. 466 and asked for its immediate consideration.

POINT OF ORDER - Mr. Cole raised a point of order against the provisions of H.Res. 466 because it violates the Congressional Budget Act. The Chair announced the disposition of the point of order would be resolved by the question of consideration of H.Res. 466. The House proceeded with 20 minutes of debate on the point of order at at the end of which the Chair will put the question on consideration.
On consideration of the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 188 (Roll no. 425).
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 466.
DEBATE - The House resumed with debate on H.Res. 466.
WITHDRAWAL OF RESOLUTION - Mr. McGovern withdrew the resolution from consideration.
By the direction of the Committee on Rules, Mr. McGovern called up H. Res. 466 and asked for its immediate consideration.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 466.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 322 - 85 (Roll no. 426).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 3401) making emergency supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2019.
